name: Eurobeat
description: Fast-paced with roots in Hi-NRG and Italo-Disco; became mainly popular in Japan in the 1990s.

children.name: J-Euro
children.description: Italian-oriented Japanese scene of Eurobeat, which emerged with Japanese-language covers of Italian songs in the early-to-mid-1990s.
